text: aur qaum aad aur samood ko (bhee halaak kar daala) aur (ai ahale makka) tum ko to unake (ujade hue) ghar bhee (raasta aate jaate) maaloom ho chuke aur shaitaan ne unakee nazar mein unake kaamon ko achchha kar dikhaaya tha aur unhen (seedhee) raah (chalane) se rok diya tha haaloki vah bade hoshiyaar the
